Uses of Interface
android.content.DialogInterface.OnClickListener

Packages that use DialogInterface.OnClickListener
android.app High-level classes encapsulating the overall Android application model. 
android.preference Provides classes that manage application preferences and implement the preferences UI. 
android.widget The widget package contains (mostly visual) UI elements to use on your Application screen. 
 

Uses of DialogInterface.OnClickListener in android.app
 

Classes in android.app that implement DialogInterface.OnClickListener
 class DatePickerDialog
          A simple dialog containing an DatePicker.
 class TimePickerDialog
          A dialog that prompts the user for the time of day using a TimePicker.
 

Methods in android.app with parameters of type DialogInterface.OnClickListener
 AlertDialog.Builder AlertDialog.Builder.setAdapter(ListAdapter adapter, DialogInterface.OnClickListener listener)
          Set a list of items, which are supplied by the given ListAdapter, to be displayed in the dialog as the content, you will be notified of the selected item via the supplied listener.
 void AlertDialog.setButton(CharSequence text, DialogInterface.OnClickListener listener)

          Set a listener to be invoked when the positive button of the dialog is pressed.

          Deprecated. Use AlertDialog.setButton(int, CharSequence, android.content.DialogInterface.OnClickListener) with DialogInterface.BUTTON_POSITIVE
